name: Internet_macAddressTest
description: Unit tests for the macAddress functionality in the Internet class.

test_cases.name: testMacAddressWithNullPrefix
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a MAC address with a null prefix.

test_cases.name: testMacAddressWithEmptyPrefix
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a MAC address with an empty prefix.

test_cases.name: testMacAddressWithValidPrefix
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a MAC address with a valid prefix.
